---
title: "Basic Flow"
---

Based on "10-Step Learning System" by John Sonmez at https://github.com/vanHeemstraSystems/10-step-learning-system

```{mermaid}
journey
    title My working day
    section Go to work
      Make tea: 5: Me
      Go upstairs: 3: Me
      Do work: 1: Me, Cat
    section Go home
      Go downstairs: 5: Me
      Sit down: 3: Me
```
